General.Name: Grand Fortune High Grade Ltd
General.Description: Grand Fortune High Grade Limited develops and operates financial training courses in China. It serves financial specialist sector. The company was formerly known as New Horizons Ultra Limited and changed its name to Grand Fortune High Grade Limited in May 2016. Grand Fortune High Grade Limited was incorporated in 2015 and is based in Tsuen Wan, Hong Kong.
General.Address: Willow House, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, KY1-1107
